name: Electris
description:
Just like Tetris, but electric! - Electris - get it!?!?

Click or drag to add elements.

Connect the left and right side of the screen to create short-circuits.

The elements heat up and explode, giving you points.

Blue and Red conduct electricity.

They are the same but Blue is light and Red is heavy.

Electric Blue is magnetic - attracts other Blue and Red.

Black is an isolator.

Electric Black is magnetic - attracts other Black.

If your screen stays full for 3 seconds, it's game over.

This is my first game ever.

The demo build has been sitting on my computer for few years now, and I figured out I'm never going to finish it.

So I stumbled upon itch.io and decided to publish it because why not...
